tiles.message: A STATUE OF A MONSTER WITH THE BODY OF A CHICKEN AND THE HEAD OF A CAT. THE STATUE IS MADE OF BRONZE
A gem-encrusted statue glows with a golden light
AREA OUT OF BOUNDS! Cloaked in eternal darkness
A SILVER STATUE OF A BOAR. WITH HORNS AND LONG FANGS
You see a wizard. He chants 'MAPIRO MAHAMA DIROMAT!!'
